alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL SULLIVAN AND CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF BRISTOL THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 505 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bristol Va, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Glade Spring, Lindell, South Holston Dam, Holston, Hilander Park, and Emory-Meadow View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
